item.title: Learnings from projects & things I've made so far.
item.description: This is a general blog post on my various schemes so far, loosely grouped around topic. I look like this when I’ve made something: Sustainability electrification | EV News, Price Tracker & Charging Maps Tech: * React-Native App * Dynamic pricing data scraped with APIfy.com * Mapping data from OpenChargeMap.com * Newest EV news scraped from Twitter Stats * Users: 10 App Store Link sunboxlabs.com | Solar Price Tracker & Platform for DIY solar With Zebulon Reynolds (for part of the way), this project sunboxlabs.
